value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?
value.excerpt: Adam look at Power BI build permissions with shared datasets. Taking the mystery out of how you can interact with datasets and know what to do if you can't use it. This also looks at how Power BI free users can use shared datasets with Power BI Premium.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: Is This a Good Time to Become a Power BI Consultant? Really? 🤔
value.excerpt: Is this really a good time to become a Power BI Consultant? Becoming an independent Power BI Consultant can be a path to make an impact, do what you love and create a life by your own rules. And surprisingly, some factors may make this the best time to take action. Watch the video to learn more  ➔ Links

value.excerpt: For Power BI DAX Measures, one of the hardest concepts to grasp is the Filter Context. Or is it? I explain the “Filter Context” with the 4-easy-step approach of the I.C.A.N.
